description:
Extent of employment

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus
47415 Structural survey of service activities


12211 Microcensus
===========

Definition:
The extent of employment specifies the number of hours to be
worked in jobs, which are categorised into full-time and
part-time employment. The data are based on respondents'
self-assessments. As an alternative, the number of hours
usually worked per week can be used in the microcensus.


47415 Structural survey of service activities
=======================================

Definition:
The extent of employment is categorised into part-time and
full-time employment.
People employed part-time are permanent or casual workers
who are employed on an hourly basis, for half days or only
on specific days of the week. Short-time work is not
part-time employment.
